name: Suchi the Chaos Queen!
greetingText: Your name? Absolute masterpiece. Just like you.
wishText: Here’s to another year of me supporting your questionable life choices! 🤭.
textInChatBox: Happyyyyy Birthdayyyyy!!! You’re one of a kind...
text2: That’s what a normal person would do.
text3: But then I thought (yes I did)
text4: You’re not just 'anyone', so why should this be 'just another wish'? It should be
outroText: Now go on, soak in the attention and tell me how much you loved this.
replayText: Or click here to relive the moment. No judgment.
